message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product for $11,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm definitely interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $11,000 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10,500.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we settle at $9,750?
Hi Bob, I'm still open to negotiating. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10,250.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To move things along, I'm willing to offer $10,000 even. That's my final offer.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to meet me at $10,000, but I'm still not comfortable with that. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10,100.
